item.title: [Non-Renamed] Pest Control Boat Interface
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:6, topic:303578”]Here’s some of the server sided crap, just place in process

sendQuest("Next Departure: "+PlayerHandler.pcWaitTimer+" seconds", 18051); //sendQuest("Players Ready: 0", 18052); //Nothing needed for line 18053, because it's just a text line... sendQuest("Pest Points: "+pcPoints+"", 18054);[/quote]

Thanks for posting.

This is the way I have it.

public void PcPanel1() { setInterfaceWalkable(18050); sendQuest("Pest Control", 15894); sendQuest("New game starts in:", 15895); sendQuest("Next Departure in: "+PlayerHandler.pcWaitTimer+" Seconds", 18051); sendQuest("Players in boat:", 15898); sendQuest("Players Ready: "+PlayerHandler.Waiters+"", 18052); sendQuest("Points:"+pcPoints+"", 18054); }
But I have a totally different pest control so.

item.title: [Non-Renamed] Pest Control Boat Interface
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Okay, I have not released something in a while so I will start releasing more stuff.

Okay In class9.java add this with your other Interfaces.

[code]public static void pestcontrol2(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) {
Class9 class9 = addTab(18050);
/* addText(ID, “Text”, ???, Size, Colour); */
addText(18051, “Next Departure: 0 seconds”, wid, 1, 0xCCCBCB);
addText(18052, “Players Ready: 0”, wid, 1, 0x5AD230);
addText(18053, “(Need 5 to 25 players)”, wid, 1, 0xDED26A);
addText(18054, “Pest Points: 0”, wid, 1, 0x99FFFF);

	class9.anInt261 = 0;
	class9.aBoolean266 = false;
	class9.anIntArray240 = new int[4];
	class9.anIntArray241 = new int[4];
	class9.anIntArray272 = new int[4];

	class9.anIntArray240[0] = 18051;// first
	class9.anIntArray241[0] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray272[0] = 16;
	class9.anIntArray240[1] = 18052;// second
	class9.anIntArray241[1] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray272[1] = 33;
	class9.anIntArray240[2] = 18053;// third
	class9.anIntArray241[2] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray272[2] = 50;
	class9.anIntArray240[3] = 18054;// forth
	class9.anIntArray241[3] = 2;
	class9.anIntArray272[3] = 66;

}[/code]

Also add thispestcontrol2(aclass30_sub2_sub1_sub4);
Under this.

aClass44 =

Then your done.

Pic

aaaaaaaaaapestinboat-2.jpg769×553
